cards.name: Rayquaza-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dragon Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't use Dragon Strike during your next turn.

ability.name: Turboblaze
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Wing
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Aerial Ace
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

cards.name: Rayquaza-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Intensifying Burn
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Shaymin-EX

ability.name: Set Up
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Sky Return
attacks.text: Return this Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

cards.name: Wally
text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-EX) and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

cards.name: Wide Lens
text: Damage from the attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by Weakness and Resistance for your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Hydreigon-EX

ability.name: Dragon Road
ability.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, the Retreat Cost of each of your Dragon Pokémon in play is ColorlessColorless less.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
